p:
In most of the earlier investigations of α-plutonium the details of the monoclinic structure were assumed to be those of Zachariasen and Ellinger
26 , observed at room temperature. Our DFT framework, however, considers zero temperature and a more thorough investigation of α-plutonium requires that the structure is resolved from theory. This was done recently
24 and the theoretical structural parameters at zero temperature are actually very close to the room-temperature x-ray results
26 . The small differences (less than 2%), however, have a slight but noticeable effect on the chemical bonding and related properties of α-plutonium.
